title: MY TOWER IS FIXED.
body:
Anybody wanna play some norms?
To help me test it out?

I also, may or may not test how FRAPS does with it aswell.

replies.body: I'll give you a game, 1v1 or team?
Any really, but the 1 v1 sounds fun hang on give me about 30 mins
Ehhh I was expecting you to just invite me in game, so I watched 3 hours of Anime instead lol.

yeah sorry, I was half way in a game. 
Then suddenly friends wanted to hang out.

Are you willing to skype? 
I want to test sound as well, if you dont mind.
why would you use fraps instead of something like OBS? not only is it a massive drain on computers, it records with huge file sizes that you're inevitably going to have to compress.

OBS can be finicky and wont record in proper quality.
Yes OBS records screens, but I dont want that.

Fraps is easy enough to compress too and records in proper 1080P
ITs also way simpler and easier to use. Just press 1 button.

Everything else is already set up.
I have used OBS, I do like it, but I like fraps for the things I wanna use.
